title: Ticket #1918: condor choosing virbr0 over other adapters which are up.
description: Condor should avoid bridged adapters (in general) as they are usually reserved for VM's. It also causes several issues with the tools.
remarks:
2011-Feb-16 16:36:02 by tstclair:
it happens when bridged adapter is iterated before adapters which are up.

2011-Feb-16 16:44:17 by danb:
When Tim and I looked into this, we saw that the status of the bridged adapter was 'UNKNOWN', whereas the status of the adapter that Condor should have chosen was 'UP'. We didn't spot much else that looked like a useful clue as to which one was preferable.

2011-May-12 13:25:54 by tstclair:
I really do think there should be a fix in the stable series. I'm no seeing folks on condor_users running into this.
